Non-action means there is no manifestation of the creation of activities, because there is not even a single dharma that can be created, therefore this is called non-action.
What is further called the absence of manifest activity?
It means there is no manifest activity of the body, speech, or mind, therefore this is called the absence of manifest activity.
If there is no manifest activity, then it is unconditioned;

It refers to the absence of location for the present activities. Therefore, this is called no location.

It means that consciousness does not abide in form, nor does it abide in feeling, perception, or mental formations.
